tool.name: Picard - Sort Sam
tool.description: Sorts the input SAM or BAM.

param.name: input_file
param.label: SAM/BAM dataset to mark duplicates in
param.help: If empty, upload or import a SAM/BAM dataset.

param.name: createMd5
param.label: Create MD 5 file
param.help: Check to create md5 file (true); uncheck to not create MD 5 file (false) - OHSU default.

param.name: createIndex
param.label: Create Index
param.help: Check to create index file (true); uncheck to not create index file (false) - OHSU default.

param.name: maxRamRecords
param.label: Maximum records in RAM
param.help: Max records in RAM. Picard default is 500000. We use 27000000 with increased JVM heap.

param.name: quietOn
param.label: Quiet - suppress job summary info on Sytem.err
param.help: Check to turn Quiet on (true); uncheck to turn it off (false) - OHSU default.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Purpose**
Sorts the input SAM or BAM Input and output formats are determined by file extension. Version: 1.110(1752)
**Picard documentation**
This is a Galaxy wrapper for SortSam, a part of the external package Picard-tools_.
.. _Picard-tools: http://www.google.com/search?q=picard+samtools
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs, outputs, and parameters**
Picard documentation says (reformatted for Galaxy):
Options:
--help -h Displays options specific to this tool.
--stdhelp -H Displays options specific to this tool AND options common to all Picard command line tools.
--version Displays program version.
INPUT=File I=File The BAM or SAM file to sort. Required.
OUTPUT=File O=File The sorted BAM or SAM output file. Required.
SORT_ORDER=SortOrder SO=SortOrder Sort order of output file Required. Possible values: {unsorted, queryname, coordinate}
